features: WASHING MADE EASY - When it comes to personal hygiene, nothing beats having a bidet in your bathroom. This handheld sprayer lets you get clean without wasting a huge amount of toilet paper!
A MORE ACCESSIBLE CHOICE - Our bathroom bidet kit is also well-suited for people with physical disabilities or limited mobility, as it allows them to comfortably wash those hard to reach places.
EASY 10-MINUTE INSTALLATION - No specialized tools required. Our toilet bidet set is very easy to install! This package has everything you need plus a detailed product manual for you to consult.
BUILT TO LAST - The bidet spray hose uses an inner tube that is designed to minimize leaks. It is encased in durable 304 stainless steel to prevent damage. Get the best value for your money!
SATISFACTION GUARANTEED - We are committed to offering 100% customer satisfaction. If this handheld bidet sprayer fails to meet your expectations, please contact us for a refund or replacement.
body.description: Planning to reduce your reliance on TP? Let’s face it, wiping with toilet paper just isn’t good. A thorough rinse will always do a better job. It helps in reducing the itchiness and irritation that your skin suffers. Constant wiping can easily result in microscopic cuts that rough tissue paper can cause. And that’s not even mentioning the environmental impact! It’s estimated that Americans use 36 billion rolls of toilet paper every year - roughly equivalent to 15 million trees. If you want to switch to a more cost-effective and nature-friendly alternative, we have the perfect solution. Enjoy a more convenient way to clean yourself with this Bidet Sprayer by H.E-Home! A bidet acts like a little showerhead, delivering concentrated water pressure wherever you aim it. This is perfect for anyone who wants to be as hygienic as possible, or people with limited mobility who require an easy method to clean any hard-to-reach spots. Have you ever been interested in getting a bidet, but balked at the thought of it requiring separate plumbing and a large amount of floor space? Worry not! This handheld bidet simply attaches to your toilet tank’s fill valve and can then mounted on the wall. It’s a very simple installation process that only takes a few minutes! Quality matters, and we have built our product in accordance with the strictest industry standards. This toilet bidet is impressively durable, with a stainless steel encased hose that is not prone to leaking and won’t twist or tangle. What else should you know about our product? Great for bathing pets, cleaning diapers, or feminine hygiene Incremental pressure system lets you spray as gently as needed Can be used to help you clean the bathroom Make sure that the most intimate parts of your body are well-cared for. Add this Bidet Sprayer by H.E-Home to your cart today!

reviews.reviewText: Perfect and so easy to Installed, thanks for this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars What I wish I’d known
reviews.reviewText: There’s not a thing wrong with the product is very good. The hose may be a little short, but what I wish out of known is how well they work I would’ve automatically bought one with the heating water before I bought the one with cold water only because they really do work well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 25, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars How did I go so long without one of THESE!?
reviews.reviewText: So, I purchased a couple of bidets for the commodes, and was having some issues with obtaining the proper water supply valves. This little gem popped up on recommended, so I took a shot. What the heck, right?One day later (awesome service from seller, THANK YOU!) it came.Fifteen minutes later, I kid you not, and it is operational. Already earning its keep. Not only can you wash yourself, but also hose down the commode! I even used it to clean out a container!Wonderful and great product, five stars all around!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great Product but the wrench is missing from the box
reviews.reviewText: I recently received a product that I was quite excited to try out. While I am overall pleased with the quality and performance of the product itself, soft water flow and no leaks whatsoever, I did encounter one issue upon unboxing it. Unfortunately, I discovered that the wrench that should have been included in the box was missing.Although this was a disappointing experience, I want to emphasize that the product itself is still of high quality and performs well. However, I do hope that the manufacturer can improve their quality control processes to ensure that all necessary components are included in future shipments. Overall, I would still recommend this product, but I would advise potential buyers to double-check that all the necessary parts are included before using it. I had a friend ordering the same product and yes, the wrench was missing there as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 3, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Environmentally friendly and helpful when you have stomach issues!
reviews.reviewText: I used to have one of the toilet seat bidets that work with your existing toilet seat. It was an amazing purchase, but after about a year, it was very hard to get the sprayers fully cleaned and sanitized because our water causes a black film to form on/in everything it touches after just a few days. The fact that it sat above the toilet water getting splashed and that it was used a lot because I suffer from IBS, it was constantly forming the black film, I decided to throw it away as I just couldn't bring myself to deep clean it every other day because I'm already in the bathroom way too often. A friend of mine recently bought a bidet similar to this handheld, and was telling me about it in light of the recent toilet paper craze. I figured there'd be no better time than right now to buy and try out a handheld. So after a few days of using it, I can already tell it is SO MUCH better than the seat attachment one we had. So much better control for all areas AND I can quickly and easily sanitize and dry it after every use without dismantling the whole seat! If you are in the fence about buying a handheld bidet, just buy one already, you won't regret it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Diaper Sprayer
reviews.reviewText: Easy to install, surprisingly a powerful little sprayer. I like that it has a switch near the bottom of the hose to turn off the water to the hose when not in use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So convenient! Especially those times of the month!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The faster nut as shown on the product page shows a typical 6 sided nut so you can tighten with the provided wrench. The faster nut on the valve I received is completely round! The provided wrench does not fit the faster nut. I tried installing it and it kept jumping the threads. Returning product.
